title: Ben Krasnow on Twitter: "In case you consider buying: my @lenovo tablet was remotely modified via forced update to have un-dismissable, un-mutable, system ad notifications from an app that cannot be uninstalled or disabled. https://t.co/0tcG79bWVV" / Twitter
description: In case you consider buying: my @lenovo tablet was remotely modified via forced update to have un-dismissable, un-mutable, system ad notifications from an app that cannot be uninstalled or disabled. https://t.co/0tcG79bWVV
